text: Futhi nangenkulumo yabo ethi, “ngempela thina sambulala uMesiya uJesu indodana kaMariya” uyisithunywa sikaMvelinqangi kepha abazange bambulale futhi abazange bambethele esiphambanweni kepha kwakwenziwe kwabonakalakanjalokubonafuthingempelalaboabaphikisana ngakho basekungabazeni ngakho, abanalo ulwazi ngakho ngaphandle kokulandela imicabango nje ngempela abazange bambulale
